title: THE BIRD OF MYSTERY.
content: For me there is a mystery unrevealed; Sweet Nature, speak to me! Lucy Larcom.

book.title: In Nesting Time
book.description: 简介： Ears have they, but they hear not, may be said of all the world. Tragedies and comedies go on continually before us which we neither see nor hear; cries of distress and prattle of infants, songs of love and screams of war, alike fall upon deaf ears,...
